dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1957
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An account of moving her daughter Tamar's family from Staten Island to a spacious home and farm in Vermont.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 729 1957-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
